attributes.action: amend age discrimination legislation to outlaw employers' use of a Normal Retirement Age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK needs as many people as possible to be in employment so that they can support those who cannot work. Recent age discrimination legislation is being used by employers to discriminate against older employees by introducing a Normal Retirement Age where they did not have one before. The only issues here at any age should be the employee's willingness to work and ability to do the job.
